snippet.title: F-Sim | Space Shuttle 2 Trailer (iOS & Android)
snippet.description:
This is the official trailer for F-Sim | Space Shuttle 2, a complete rewrite of our critically acclaimed flight simulator for iOS and Android.

Download on the App Store (iOS)
https://apps.apple.com/app/f-sim-space-shuttle-2/id1546191619

Google Play Store (Android)
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.fsim.spaceshuttle2.android

The game simulates the Space Shuttle approach and landing in incredible detail and accuracy.

Our custom rendering engine delivers desktop class flight simulation to mobile devices: a unique combination of realistic flight dynamics, stunning graphics, and fun game play.

https://www.fsim.com | https://www.skytale-software.com
